mapper.select: select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.account_no , a.user_name , a.email , convert(varchar(max), a.password) as password , a.user_type , a.nation_code , a.phone_number , a.use_status , a.regist_datetime , a.regist_company , a.regist_user , a.modify_datetime , a.modify_company , a.modify_user from member as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where email = #{email};
